definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: I cannot overemphasize the psychological trauma to these people.
sentences.chinese: 我无法更加强强调他们所受的心理创伤。

sentences.english: I just emphasized different elements in a way to manipulate your intuitions.
sentences.chinese: 我只是强调了不同的要素来操纵你们的直觉。

sentences.english: This paper lays stress on the fulfillment of students' initiative in English teaching.
sentences.chinese: 本文强调在英语教学中应始终发挥学生的主体作用。

sentences.english: Geomantic avoid learning appropriate piece in emphasize glancing particularly for big fierce, say to glance evil spirit.
sentences.chinese: 风水学宜忌篇中非凡强调反光为大凶，称反光煞。

sentences.english: Mio Wei stressed that over the next five years is the critical period of China's industrial transformation and upgrading.
sentences.chinese: 苗圩强调，未来五年是我国工业转型升级的攻坚时期。

sentences.english: Stress your experience and your energy.
The thesis emphasizes the materiality of the compensation allocation first.
sentences.chinese: 论文首先强调了薪酬分配的重要性。

sentences.english: In the United States, the emphasis on individual autonomy usually results in stigmatization of the accused offender.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，强调个人主义，通常会导致罪犯被告上法庭。

sentences.english: We urged on you the importance of the time factor.
sentences.chinese: 我们曾向你方强调过时间因素的主要性。

sentences.english: It now features Onyx Nubuck leather highlighted in orange.
sentences.chinese: 现在它的功能玛瑙磨砂皮革中强调橙色。

sentences.english: The team leader emphasized the importance of the rescue.
sentences.chinese: 队长强调了这次营救任务的重要性。
我一直强调说，艾文斯并没有罪。
幸福伴侣总是强调积极的一面。

sentences.english: China emphasizes a hands-off foreign policy towards the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 中国强调不干涉他国内政的外交政策。

sentences.english: Li emphasized that cooperation is an effective tool to cope with the challenges faced by mankind.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星强调，合作是应对人类共同挑战的有效途径。

sentences.english: There's an acute accent on thee in 'blé' which is the French word for corn.
sentences.chinese: 在法语中是玉米的意思，它上面有个强调符号。

definition: to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to implement/to put into practice/to carry out
to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
to attach importance to sth/to value
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to bring to sb's attention
